ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Thu, 2 Mar 2000 12:07:21 -0500 (EST)
> From: <kim@...>
> Subject: Re: Kunark and new stuff
>
> On Wed, 1 Mar 2000, B. Bedford wrote:
>
> Let me guess. The levels after 50 are all hellish enough that
> other classes get new spells at the increased rate of every
> level instead of every 4-5. We will still get one song per
> level though...

Actually from the lists I have seen, the other classes get 1-3 spells per
level instead of 10-12 every 5 levels. So the other classes do not have an
increased rate of new spells. They just get them spread out instead of
clumped together.

> I *really* hate level-based systems...

At least it is better than the Spell Circle System where you get 10 new
spells every 5 levels. I always liked the Bard's one song per level style.
You always get something new at each level.

Wayne
